simpplle.gui

Class NewSampleArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • simpplle.gui.NewSampleArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class NewSampleArea
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    The University of Montana owns copyright of the designated documentation contained within this file as part of the software product designated by Uniform Resource Identifier UM-OpenSIMPPLLE-1.0. By copying this file the user accepts the University of Montana Open Source License Contract pertaining to this documentation and agrees to abide by all restrictions, requirements, and assertions contained therein. All Other Rights Reserved.

    This class creates the New Sample Area dialog, a type of JDialog. This allows the user to select a sample area from the comcode.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • NewSampleArea

        public NewSampleArea(SimpplleMain frame,
             java.lang.String title,
             boolean modal)
        Primary constructor for NewSampleArea dialog. Sets the frame that owns the dialog to the main frame for Simpplle, dialog title, and modality.
        Parameters:
        frame - owner of the dialog
        title - title of dialog
        modal - specifies whether dialog blocks user input to other top-level windows when shown

      • NewSampleArea

        public NewSampleArea()
        Overloaded constructor for NewSampleArea dialog. References the primary constructor and sets owner to null, title to empty string and modality to modeless.

    • Method Detail

      • jbInit

        void jbInit()
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes the new sample area dialog with panels, components, titles, and layouts.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Initializes the logic for the jdialog by getting the comcodes sample areas for the currently loaded zone.

      • ok

        private void ok()
        If none of the list of sample areas are selected sends an error message to the user. If there is one selected loads the sample area, then disposes of the new sample area dialog.

      • cancel

        private void cancel()
        Cancels the dialog in the normal way by setting the visibility to false and disposing it.

      • loadSampleArea

        private void loadSampleArea()
        Loads sample area for the current zone from the comcode that the user selected. Sends a message to the user to reassure them that the selected sample area is loading. Then tries to load it. If there is a problem sends an error message to the user and sets the cursor to the default cursor.

      • OkButton_actionPerformed

        void OkButton_actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        If ok button pushed, loads the sample area if one is selected (sends error if none selected), then disposes of the new sample area dialog.
        Parameters:
        e - 'OK'

      • CancelButton_actionPerformed

        void CancelButton_actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        If user presses the 'Cancel' button, the new sample area dialog is disposed.
        Parameters:
        e - 'Cancel'

      • theList_mouseClicked

        void theList_mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Handles a mouse click within the list of sample areas. Loads the user selected area from the comcode and disposes the new sample area dialog.
        Parameters:
        e -
